races.pace: Fair play for swoopers on the big track

contenders.name: OYSTER LANE
contenders.analysis: WIN PICK Sets the standard with a Speed Figure of 66 and a 2nd placing at Flemington.

contenders.name: GENERAL BLU
contenders.analysis: Improved to win a Flemington jumpout. Main danger.

contenders.name: WRITTEN PERFECT
contenders.analysis: JUMPOUT BLACK BOX Won 2 of last 3 Cranbourne jumpouts. Provisional rating of 88.

contenders.name: MAYEKI
contenders.analysis: Jumpout form at Flemington is superior to the country trial form of rivals.

contenders.name: PRINCESS PAINTON
contenders.analysis: Red Flag: Last in two jumpouts.

races.pace: Stamina test on the Big Track

contenders.name: PHOENICIAN
contenders.analysis: Clear standout following scratchings. Proven stayer.

contenders.name: COWARRIE
contenders.analysis: Placed at Stawell but form lines are thinner.

contenders.name: URBAN OUTLOOK (GB)
contenders.analysis: Beneficiary of scratchings. Wide sweeping turns suit his momentum-building style.

contenders.name: STAR TESTYMONY
contenders.analysis: Likely leader but may be vulnerable late on the big track.

contenders.name: ROSE OF SHALAA
contenders.analysis: CLASS CRUSH Dropping from a $175k Metro race. Massive class differential.

contenders.name: EBONY FIGHTER
contenders.analysis: Loves Geelong (1 start for 1 win). Main danger.

contenders.name: ULTRA BLUE
contenders.analysis: VALUE PLAY Disparity protocol. Drops from BM78 to Class 1. Rating drop of 15-20 points.

contenders.name: DIMORA QUEEN
contenders.analysis: BEST BET Golden Gap scenario. Rates 8+ points clear of this depleted field.
